price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើង(អល់ឡោះ)បានផ្ដល់សិទ្ធិអំណាច ដល់គេនៅលើផែនដីនេះ ហើយយើងបានផ្ដល់ឱ្យគេនូវមាគ៌ាគ្រប់ បែបយ៉ាង។
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
